description: Gets user access details in a batch request. This action polls data from the tasks that are kicked off by the StartUserAccessTasks action.

parameters.name: appBundleIdentifier
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or Universal Unique Identifier (UUID) of the app bundle to use for the request.

parameters.name: taskIdList
parameters.description: The tasks IDs to use for the request. (string) ---

nested_items.name: userAccessResultsList
nested_items.description: Contains a list of user access results.

nested_items.name: tenantId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application tenant.

nested_items.name: tenantDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the tenant.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the task.

nested_items.name: resultStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the user access result item.
IN_PROGRESS: The user access task is in progress.
COMPLETED: The user access task completed successfully.
FAILED: The user access task failed.
EXPIRED: The user access task expired.

nested_items.name: email
nested_items.description: The email address of the target user.

nested_items.name: userFullName
nested_items.description: The full name of the user.

nested_items.name: userFirstName
nested_items.description: The first name of the user.

nested_items.name: userLastName
nested_items.description: The last name of the user.

nested_items.name: userStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the user returned by the application.

nested_items.name: taskError
nested_items.description: Contains information about an error returned from a user access task.
